name: punchcardjs-demo

scripts.clean: trash sites/demo/*.js trash sites/demo/punchcards.min.js.map !sites/demo/main-script.js sites/demo/*.css sites/demo/bootstrap-css sites/demo/fonts
scripts.copy-sites-demo-deps: npm run copy-sites-demo-js && npm run copy-sites-demo-css && npm run copy-sites-demo-fonts
scripts.predemo: npm run clean && mkdirp sites/demo && mkdirp sites/demo/fonts && mkdirp sites/demo/bootstrap-css
scripts.purge: npm run clean & npm run clean-downloaded

author: Johan Hidding, Mateusz Kuzak, Jurriaan H. Spaaks, Lourens Veen, Faruk Diblen
